lood. About 7 out of 10 people who have hemophilia A have the severe form of the disorder.
                
People who don't have hemophilia have a factor VIII activity of 100 percent. People who have severe hemophilia A have a factor VIII activity of less than 1 percent.
                
Hemophilia usually occurs in males (with rare exceptions). About 1 in 5,000 males are born with hemophilia each year.",NHLBI,Hemophilia
